action: Detailed plan for 'real-life ML project' outlined.
notes: Project: Predicting daily audience count for cinema based on ticket bookings (BookNow app & POS). Data: 1 year of time series data across 7 tables. Current status: EDA completed on all tables. Next steps: Prepare master table, train and test a baseline model.
